item.description:
Water's Edge is having their 7th annual Fireworks Celebration...and YOU are invited. What a great way to spend an evening! Al Fresco dinging at the Sunset Bar & Grill...Live Entertainment starting @ 5pm...Fireworks at Dusk...and a scrumptious buffet dinner is offered.See the menu below:


Waterâ€™s Edge Resort & Spa 2009 Fireworks Dinner Buffet Menu
Tuesday, June 30, 2009 Seating Starting at 5:30pm

Caesar Salad Station With Traditional Accompaniments
Tuscan Grilled Marinated Vegetable Salad
Roasted Garlic Balsamic Vinaigrette, Fresh Basil Pesto
Vine Ripened Tomato & Fresh Mozzarella Salad
Extra Virgin Olive Oil, Cracked Black Pepper
Pineapple Teriyaki Glazed London Broil
Wilted Summer Greens
Fire Grilled Breast of Marinated Chicken
Blood Orange BBQ Glaze, Black Bean & Grilled Corn Salsa
Crab and Boursin Stuffed Filet of Sole
Lemon Zest and Caper Beurre Blanc
Roasted Garlic Whipped Yukon Gold Potatoes
Green Beans and Roasted Red Bell Peppers
Chocolate Mousse Cake
New York Style Cheesecake

Dinner Buffet ~ $25.00++ per person

So come enjoy the evening with your friends...or meet new ones!!!

(Above Pricing Does Not Reflect Tax & Service Charge
item.how_to_find_us: "Look for the Meetup sign on our FUN table!!!"
